title: Cruise Rooms & Suites | Utopia of the Seas | Royal Caribbean Cruises
text: WELCOME TO THE SUITE SPOT BOLDER WAYS TO MAX YOUR STAY Dial up the weekend â and the luxe â at the Suite Neighborhood onboard the new Utopia of the SeasÂ®. High up in the shipâs most prime location, experience exclusive amenities and unforgettable moments. Indulge in five-star dining at Coastal Kitchen, where Mediterranean flavors meet California cool with the freshest seasonal ingredients. Soak up rays on the Suite Sun Deck, or cool down in the plunge pool with in-water loungers and panoramic sea views. And for cocktails with your crew, look no further than the stylish Suite Lounge.
